merge_ppt¶

Merge PPT Extension for Nautilus This extension allows users to merge selected PPT and PPTX files into a single file using an external script. It integrates with the Nautilus file manager to provide a context menu option for merging PPT files. It is designed to work with Nautilus 3.0 and later versions.

class merge_ppt.MergePPTExtension[source]¶

Bases: Object, MenuProvider

Extension to merge selected PPT and PPTX files in Nautilus.

get_file_items(*args: Any) → List[Any][source]¶

Return a list of menu items for the selected files.

merge_ppt_files(_menu: Any, files: List[Any]) → None[source]¶

Invoke external script to merge selected PPT and PPTX files.
